title: "were updating assasins for more counterplay"
body:
then create and release {{champion:164}}  with dat ult.

replies.body: She is not an assassin though. In fact she is more of being one portion among update itself rather than being the target of the update. Or is the second part what you're focusing at?
tried to make a joke, obviously didn't work
